H0.text: Coal is the renewable energy source that the student suggests the school board use.

H1.text: Wind is the renewable energy source the student suggests the school board use.

H2.text: Wood is the renewable energy source the student suggests the school board should use.

H3.text: Natural gas is the renewable energy source the student suggests the school board use.

A4.text: Wind turbines have some of the lowest life-cycle greenhouse-gas emissions of energy sources

A5.text: Surveys of public attitudes across Europe and in many other countries show strong public support for wind power
